title: About Neo Pax Sivir i need a rioters help
body:
Can i get this skin by rerolling 3 skin shards?
I have every skin in the game i want to know if i can do it?
SS Vayne and all the other loot exclusive skins can be obtained that way.

replies.body:
I don't actually have a concrete answer just yet, but as far as I know right now, Neo Pax Sivir is going to be available through 10 gemstones when she releases. Other gemstone skins are obtainable through rerolling, but the regular Pax Sivir was a limited skin which are *not* available through rerolling. 

This brings us to a dilemma....we haven't actually stated just yet whether she is a Limited or Mythic skin as far as I know. It does seem like she will be labeled as a Limited Skin as well this time, but I'll be sure to reach back out once I have a definitive answer!

What's a mythic skin?

How much money do I need to spend to get 10 gemstones?
Mythic skins are those that are only obtainable through gemstones. There isn't a certain amount of money you need to spend to get those gems as they're random drops.

I was curious, and decided to roll 3 skin shards I had lying there, and rolled the Lancer Zero Hecarim skin. I also have an idle Soulstealer Vayne shard, while also owning her skin. According to this logic, I would assume that yes, if she's available to purchase with gems, she can also be rolled with skin shards. However, I won't really know for sure until she becomes available. At which, I will either get a perm skin shard for a skin I already own, or I will receive the Neo Pax Sivir skin. However, being that she's going to be available only for a limited time, there's the possibility that she could be an exception, in which case, I'm prepared to get her the old fashion way through gemstones. I hope it's obtainable rolling skin shards, just so I can hold on to my pretty little gemstones a bit longer.

After I checked back in my loot tab, I noticed "Exclusive Lancer Zero Hecarim Skin" still available for purchase for 10 gems after rolling lancer with shards... are they any different?

To update this post, it now shows "Exclusive Lancer Zero Hecarim Skin" as owned, and no longer available for purchase for 10 gems, without needing to purchase it after rolling it with shards.
